articles.title: Kevin O'Connell's Wife Stole the Spotlight on Thursday Night - Athlon Sports
articles.description: Leah O'Connell, the wife of Minnesota Vikings coach Kevin O'Connell, grabbed attention on the red carpet of the NFL Honors award ceremonies.
articles.content: There were a number of big winners in Thursday's NFL Honors awards ceremony at Saenger Theatre in New Orleans. The league honored the best players in the NFL this past season just days before Super B… [+1457 chars]

articles.author: Kyle Brown
articles.title: MSHSL says it will allow student-athletes to compete according to their gender identity - KSTP
articles.description: The Minnesota State High School League will continue its policy of letting student athletes to "participate consistent with their gender identity," according to a memo sent to MSHSL member schools on Thursday.
